duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform full inspection and diagnosis of pumps, pump ends, and electrical systems.
Troubleshoot for priming and performance issues on Centrifugal Pump System.
Diagnose and repair trailer issues, including trailer electrical, wheels, tires, and bearings.
Identify pipe fittings and flanges, and demonstrate pipe and hose assembly methods for safe installation.
Load, transport, and install pumps for customers, and inspect and test pumps using various methods.
Travel to customer sites to troubleshoot, make repairs, and manage work orders.
Assist in the training of lower-level mechanics, complete paperwork, and participate in on-call rotation.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Pump Mechanics or Mechanical Engineering (Degree in Mechanical Engineering preferred)
